item.title: Now taking bookings for forest garden tours and workshops
item.author: hello@growdigital.org (Jake Rayson)
item.description: Our 2019 workshops and tours are now available to book on Airbnb: Forest garden workshop Forest garden tour Both available from April through to September 2019 The tour is 2 hours, available in two slots 10am-12pm & 2pm-4pm The workshop is 6 hours, 10am-4pm It has been an interesting experience (ahem) to go through the Airbnb application process.
